data.text: @NSWHealth Call CPS on any parent who puts a creepy mask on their child

@mkitteringham @NSWHealth @DETVic @NSWPandCFed @VicGovernor @amavictoria @ParentsVictoria @AEUVictoria @AEUfederal @VPA71 @VictorianCHO @JamesMerlinoMP @smitchellmlc That’s great to hear. You’re a good leader Murray.
@michael3110au @NSWHealth #DontLookUp don’t look in a school whatever you do 🙄

@annatime94 @NSWHealth We have some in hospital, and sadly still having some deaths, but is the pandemic raging, really ?  What is your definition of raging pandemic ? Your tweet seems to be political designed to continue fear.
@olthwaite_eric @NSWHealth @AnitaN1007 No to mandatory masks, no to mandatory booster, do you have a need to control others ? Can you control yourself ?

@bees_oz @NSWHealth @DETVic @NSWPandCFed @VicGovernor @amavictoria @ParentsVictoria @AEUVictoria @AEUfederal @VPA71 @VictorianCHO @JamesMerlinoMP @smitchellmlc I’m not aware of any colleagues advocating for the removal of masks. Schools are institutions that reflect the settings in the broader community. Public schools do not write their own policy, our role is to follow the DoE policies according to the government of the time.
@NSWHealth @AnitaN1007 "Needs or chooses" FFS they should be mandatory
